text: Now it came to pass after [strongs id="h310" /] the death [strongs id="h4194" /] of Saul [strongs id="h7586" /], when David [strongs id="h1732" /] was returned [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /] from the slaughter [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8687" /] of the Amalekites [strongs id="h6002" /], and David [strongs id="h1732" /] had abode [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] two [strongs id="h8147" /] days [strongs id="h3117" /] in Ziklag [strongs id="h6860" /];
